Name: A Path to Light
About the game: ♦ One after another, each step is important. ♦ The goal is to find a way to solve the puzzle by reaching the light, in this process you need to explore the possibilities and develop your skills to discover the rules. ♦ You guide your steps in four directions, up, down, left and right. ♦ CONTROLS: WASD or Arrow Keys (grid based movement) ♦ 40 unique handcrafted levels. ( ~1 hour gameplay) ♦ No tutorials. ♦ On your journey you will find several elements that will help or hinder you, such as portals, enemies, doors, collectibles, among other things you will discover. ♦ Test your skills, and see if you can find the way.
